name: Oasis Horizon
description: Oasis Horizon is an exploration game where the player has crash landed onto an unknown planet. You must survive long enough to find 4 collectible pieces in order to craft a transmitter to send a rescue signal. While on the planet, you must manage your oxygen levels to make sure that you don't run out. You must find and collect resources to maintain your oxygen generating plants and upgrade your base. This will allow you to venture out of your base for longer periods of time.
